projects.title: Building American Sign Language (ASL) Foundations via Applied Machine Learning
projects.bodyText:
- This is an end-to-end Machine Learning project.
 -  I take a raw image dataset, extract the data from each image, conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA), train and evaluate multiple models and deploy the best model in a flask app.
 - This project was intended for live video classification but had issues when deploying the flask app so I opted to use static image classification on the live site.

projects.title: Go-to-Market Insight for Cab Investment Firm
projects.bodyText:
- Exploring a Cab dataset consisting of two companies as a potential 'investment' opportunity.
 - Conducted basic data cleaning, exploration, and hypothesis testing.

projects.title: Data Cleaning in SQl Server
projects.bodyText: -  This is project demonstrates basic knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server.

projects.title: COVID-19 Dataset
projects.bodyText: - Using Microsoft SQL Server to explore a COVID-19 dataset.
